name: Hypercubic
long_description:
Hypercubic is an AI-native maintenance and modernization platform for mainframes. We help enterprises understand and preserve their most critical systems running on mainframes. These systems, originally built in the 1960sâ€“90s, still power trillions in global infrastructure but have become increasingly opaque as original developers retire or leave the workforce. 

We're laying the foundation to autonomously maintain and modernize these legacy systems using frontier AI.


Learn more at hypercubic.ai
one_liner: AI to maintain and modernize mainframes.
